articles.title: FCB Group India launches 'FCB NOW' - a program to bring platforms and brands together around new-age solutions - Campaign Brief Asia
articles.description: FCB Group India has announced 'FCB NOW', a program that brings together brands and platforms to develop new-age solutions.
articles.content:
FCB Group India has announced ‘FCB NOW’, a program that brings together brands and platforms to develop new-age solutions.
This new program is possible through FCB’s partnerships with industry giant… [+998 chars]
